title: Improving the Mental Health of Indonesian Migrant Workers in Thailand: Screening, Support, and Education within a Single Technology Platform
description: This program aims to improve the mental health of Indonesian migrant workers in Thailand through integrated screening, support, and educational services delivered via a single technology platform.
